structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ORGANIZATION AND GOVERNMENT OF CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS

law.catch_line: Appointment and removal of subordinate officers, agents, and employees -- Compensation.

text.section: The director of each executive department may appoint chiefs of divisions of his department, and remove them at pleasure. Except as otherwise provided by law, he may employ such officers and agents as are necessary in his department, and may, subject to any limitations imposed by ordinance, fix their compensation. Each director of an executive department may administer oaths.
All officers and agents of the city not required by law to be elected or appointed in any other manner shall be elected or appointed in the manner prescribed by ordinance.
